oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Prayer to the Stars. By /han=kasso (L VIII.-28. 8447-8449). Prayer of the narrators grandfather to the star Canopus. (L VIII.-28. 8452-8458). People pray to the stars so that they will be able to see game (that their dogs will kill for them) on the hunting-ground at night.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Prayer to a star
